817850.name: Kite Soundtrack
817850.description:
Kite's epic all-original Synthwave Soundtrack by composer Liam Hanley is now available to own! Prepare your ears for a harmonious medley of electronic genres and brooding, mechanical beats. With flavors of Synthpop, Drumstep and Dark Ambience, you don't want to miss a single note of this genius composition!

Kite OST - 12 Tracks

1. Never The Same - Liam Hanley - 3:03
2. The King of Pop - Liam Hanley - 4:04
3. The Dojo - Liam Hanley - 2:13
4. You Won't Remember Me - Liam Hanley - 3:21
5. I'll Be There Yesterday - Liam Hanley - 4:11
6. U.G. Prophet - Liam Hanley - 3:59
7. Doomsday Computer - Liam Hanley - 4:30
8. You Aren't Safe Anymore - Liam Hanley - 5:34
9. Helicopter Fistfight - Liam Hanley - 2:11
10. Invasion '86 - Liam Hanley - 3:24
11. Beneath The Waves - Liam Hanley - 4:05
12. Sunny Day - Liam Hanley - 3:12

Tracks files are easy to grab 128 kbps 48000 Hz Stereo .mp3 format.
